title: An exit door shall not open immediately upon a flight of stairs; a landing equal to atleast the width of the door shall be provided in the stairway at each doorway; the level of the landing shall be the same as that of the floor which it serves
clause_text: An exit door shall not open immediately upon a flight of stairs; a landing equal to atleast the width of the door shall be provided in the stairway at each doorway; the level of the landing shall be the same as that of the floor which it serves. Exit doorways shall be open able from the side which they serve, without the use of a key.
